title: Placid Magic card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a crumpled wizard's hat, abandoned and stomped into the dirt.}} The Placid Magic card drains magic, applies an [[antimagic]] effect to spellcasters, and removes magical effects as if from a [[potion of cancellation]].
